lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Brittany

lender.name: Gillian
lender.occupational_info: Holistic Therapy is pleasant, non invasive and used to treat a variety of conditions or simply to reduce stress. It treats the person rather than the ailment and brings wholeness in the body, mind and spirit.

lender.name: Source Legacy
lender.loan_because: Well, it's not just me who loans under my name -- it's my entire organization (The Source Legacy Foundation, Inc.). Many people within our organization make donations each week so that we are able to help individuals in the world. I LOVE Kiva because it is so ingenious, and because it allows the individual to grown and expand (or just survive) in a dignified way that allows them to maintain their self-respect.
lender.occupational_info: We are a ministerial organization at our core, but we also each creative empowerment and life skills to a large cross-section of the public in a number of our unique and inspiring programs.

lender.name: Muraleetharan
lender.loan_because: Microcredit plays a vital role in eliminating poverty around the world by promoting self-employment.

lender.loan_because: It makes sense.

lender.name: garret
lender.loan_because: I know the money is going to some one who needs it much more then me.

lender.name: Kelly & Leonard
lender.loan_because: We are blessed in order to bless others.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a BRILLIANT idea. What an easy yet fantastic way to help someone improve their life! I LOVE that the end goal is about sustainability and empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: My wife and I run a small graphic design firm, creating magazines, websites and all sorts of marketing materials for clients all over the United States.

lender.name: Travis

lender.occupational_info: I invest in houses to be built and sold.

lender.name: Mary and Chris

lender.loan_because: I want to help those that want to improve their lives but don't have the resources.

I believe that what self-centered men have torn down, other-centered men can build up." Martin Luther King, Jr.,

lender.name: Gareth
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to get themselves out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers.

lender.name: Marilien
lender.loan_because: everyone can make a difference

lender.name: Martin

lender.name: Brad

lender.name: Lynn Katie & Max

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I love to help people!
lender.occupational_info: I am the manager for three small rural hospitals.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I hope it will bring a better way of life to this person.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: We all belong to one community.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: The thought of exploring has always driven me to be curious about the world around me and push myself to fulfill my potentials. Everyone should be given the opportunities to follow their dreams and live up to their potentials without unjust restrictions.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for a Bachelors of Science in Aerospace Engineering. I focus in human space settlement and international relations. In other words, I'm trying to find ways for people like you and me to live better both on the earth and off of it.

lender.name: Garrick & Andrea
lender.loan_because: Providing unimpeded lending opportunities to hard working individuals.
lender.occupational_info: Help for economic needs for hard working men and women to create income for schooling, more jobs, and family health

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: I lived in Nigeria as a child. My parents were teachers. It changed me. It changed my family. Neither I, nor my children, nor my children's children will ever take for granted the tremendous gifts and opportunities we have as US citizens. I give because I need to share what little I have with those who have much, much less -- and will do much, much more with my little $100 than I ever could.
lender.occupational_info: I write books on computers for other people to learn how to use computers. I have also raised two children as a single mom and was unemployed for over five years. I look for loans where there is a family without a paid worker or a hard-working single mom. Nothing is more heartbreaking than not being able to make enough money to care for your children no matter how hard you try. For me to recover, it took the kindness and trust of the families where I was a nanny. Their faith in me and the opportunities they offered turned my life around. Now, with Kiva, I can return the favor to others!

lender.name: Barry & P.K.
lender.loan_because: To one degree or another we've all been helped in our careers and lives by others; and in turn most of us have helped those immediately around us. Kiva offers the opportunity to lend a hand to those where help and support are not readily available or may not exist at all.
lender.occupational_info: HR consultant and entrepreneur (Barry); executive director of Fife Chamber of Commerce (PK)

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because:
This is not a handout. This is a hand up to a better way of living.
If everyone helps a little then no one person has to help a lot.
lender.occupational_info: Work to keep telecommunications and internet expanding and working. Also work in agriculture and train horses.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make it in this world.
lender.occupational_info: bake breads and pastries that are sold at the grocery store.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: It was a Christmas gift from my uncle.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be an engineer.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I want to help others that are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am an owner / operator of a small transportation company.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: If everybody helped everyone just a little, the world would be a better place for it.
lender.occupational_info: My occupation involves making cold things hot and hot things cold.

lender.name: Lara
lender.loan_because: I love the ability to empower individuals to enhance one's life by benefiting not only themselves but those around them.
lender.occupational_info: I instruct yoga and represent a hospital.

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: I don't want my only impact on the world to be as a consumer.

lender.name: Green Finds, Inc.
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed by the Entrepreneur Angels. I have been a self-made businessman since the age of 17, Man I gota tell you there have been plenty times time when I needed a small loan to get back up and I had nowhere to go for that. So now that im back up... many times over, I feel blessed and want to share my wealth with my fellow entrepreneurs. It's amazing the small amount that is needed to continue a small business, its the passion that really drives a small business not the multi million dollar funding that we think we need in the States.
lender.occupational_info: Greenfinds.com is a online retail store and also organizes designer sample sales "Samples for (eco)mpassion" that support various charities.

lender.name: Stephan
lender.loan_because: Gotta do something to help

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I believe that its our moral responsibility to help one another. I enjoy knowing that I'm helping someone.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a clinic part time and later in the day I work at an after school program. I'm a mother to three wonderful children.

lender.name: Gus the Drover
lender.loan_because: With appropriate capital resources, anyone can grab onto the entreprenuerial spirit and become prosperous through hard work and determination.
lender.occupational_info: I am a cowboy. Just like the movies.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I love God and I want to use His money for good!

lender.name: sheila parks&mike taylor
lender.loan_because: there must be a reason why we are taught to share our toys and sweets when we are children. it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: i (sheila) am currently recovering from a traumatic injury and spend time researching pain conditions on the internet; my husband (mike) works at a hotel and is the manager of the housekeeping department

lender.name: Arun
lender.loan_because: I think all of us should have a sense of social responsibility to promote ideas and thought processes that help in creating self sustaining economic activities. We take so much from this world, we can after all lend some back for good causes.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of computer software engineers who create IT applications.

lender.name: Lee and Joey
lender.loan_because: We both know how it feels to have someone give a helping hand. We are both Christians and would like to share Jesus's love for all people.
lender.occupational_info: Lee teaches 4th grade students (students who are 9 or 10 years old). Joey teaches 8th grade science (students who are 13 or 14 years old).

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: Because I can and I should. This is a part of my investment in myself.
lender.occupational_info: I write technical documents.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to teach my children the power of giving and karma.
lender.occupational_info: I prepare young children for public school. I teach them the basics (ABC's and 123's) plus social skills, confidence, and respect. Did I mention we have a blast too!

lender.name: SHAMA
lender.occupational_info: Computer Application Developer

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: other people helped me when I started my own business
lender.occupational_info: I am a part-time bookkeeper, who also is a singer and writes songs for a living

lender.name: Susan
lender.occupational_info: I do research on plants. We hope to learn how to increase plant yields, so that people can grow more food and so that we can afford to use more plants for fuel.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference directly.
lender.occupational_info: I help homeowners pay off their houses in as little as one-third to one-half the time using current income. I also help folks get solar power with no money out of pocket.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and it can foster independence.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Someone helped me out in the past and I promised that I would pay it forward. I like to help others and I hope that those who are successful in their projects might do the same for someone else when they can.
lender.occupational_info: I edit television shows and movies that play all around the world for hundreds of millions of people. I use computers to select the pictures, sounds, and music that people watch, listen, and hopefully enjoy. I get to be very creative and work with lots of different types of people, sometimes I get to travel and see other parts of the world. Every day I get to communicate new ideas and entertain others. It's a lot of fun.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupation: VP in a large hospital system
lender.loan_because: I enjoy sharing some of my rewards with others that are trying to better their life's situation.
lender.occupational_info: The hospitals I work for help people get better every day. 50% of our profits are given back to the community.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: There are so many inequities in the world and so much constant bad news...we need to help our neighbors, no matter how far away, to pull themselves from poverty.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: Charity is really important to me. I feel that if we have the resources--even just the smallest--we have the responsibility to share.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: My life is filled with God's blessings. I want to share my blessings with others.

lender.name: Hermilando
lender.loan_because: I need to expand my printing business.
lender.occupational_info: I provide technical assistance to local government units. I also print all sorts of information materials and use printing equipment like photocopying machines, ringbinder, printers, etc.

lender.name: Penny
lender.loan_because: I truly believe in the resoursefulness of people with little income. It is so wonderful to be able to give them a step up even in the smallest way.
lender.occupational_info: I have taught kindergarten children and children with special needs for 36 years here in Hamilton, Canada

lender.name: Carole
lender.loan_because: I am self-employed and I know how difficult it can be to get started. I find working for myself is very rewarding and enjoy seeing others beginning a new venture on their own. I

lender.name: Lee & Karen
lender.loan_because: We can.

lender.name: Jong Yang
lender.loan_because: We must not, in trying to think about how we can make a big difference, ignore the small daily differences we can make which, over time, add up to big differences that we often cannot foresee

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: It is the best way I have found to help people that need a hand getting started.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good! I'm not rich by American standards, but my little loan can make a big difference and I like that.
lender.occupational_info: I help adults learn English as a second language.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: There are hard-working people in the world that are looking for a hand up, not a hand out, and they deserve the opportunity to succeed.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: it is very interesting and satisfying...to see how you are affecting someones life in a positive way
lender.occupational_info: I buy, repair, rent and sell homes and other buildings

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: It's time to share my success with others.

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I just want to do something to help out people less fortunate than me. I think that microloans are an excellent way of stimulating the local economy.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying the magnetic fields of our galaxy. I look at the dust and gas that lie between the stars and try to understand how they came to be there and whether magnetic fields played any part in this.

lender.name: Deanna
lender.loan_because: to help my neighor
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: There should be no 3rd world, I want to help those that wish to help themselves. Having a 3rd world / developing nation is a terrible reflection on out consumer society. End poverty now.
lender.occupational_info: Getting high on getting by is my stock and trade, living life day to day and picking up the pieces where ever they fall.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do

lender.name: Genevieve and Dave
lender.loan_because: Gutta cavat lapidem.

lender.name: Russell
lender.loan_because: It is easy, and it is wonderful to be in a position to help people improve their lives. I love it! It makes me joyful. It is great to help, even in a small way, to improve the economy in friendly countries. I really cherish the freedom and opportunity that I have to share some of the blessings that I enjoy.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a not-for-profit medical institution, affiliated with the United Way. We treat people who have suffered a stroke, brain, or spinal cord injury. They are sent from Hospitals to us for therapy to learn to move, speak, and walk again. I work in the Finance Department. I try to keep our doors open by billing insurance companies for our services.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I can. It's easy. Everyone should have the opportunity to make a better life for themselves and their families. It makes the distances across the globe much smaller. Why not loan?

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I believe that anyone can operate their own business.

lender.name: Eight servants
lender.loan_because: ECC 11:1 Cast your bread upon the waters, for after many days you will find it again.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: I am a self taught engineer. I have always created jobs for myself instead of working within established companies. There is great joy in finding your own path. Kiva can help those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Combination of computer programming and mechanical engineering to make machines that move cameras in ways that a human cameraman can not do -- swinging on ropes, gliding on tracks, hanging from kites . . . .

lender.name: Zoe
lender.loan_because: I feel satisfied knowing that I have helped someone else have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a high school student, and I hope to one day work in the literary field.

lender.name: Dhiraj
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing and easy way to alleviate poverty and help someone make their living.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I work largely in developing countries for fees. This is a way of giving a little something back, and at the same time watching with interest how your support is woprking
lender.occupational_info: I am a consultants and specialist in Fisheries planning including micro business development

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I truly want to see the end of poverty, hate, and ignorance in the world. KIVA is taking small steps to make a huge difference.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the right to look after their families in the best way possible. I have been blessed with more than enough material resources, and would like to share some of them with others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a primary school teacher. When schools need a substitute teacher for a day or longer, they call me!

lender.name: Amie
lender.loan_because: We are so lucky in the US to have so much, that I feel it is my duty as a human being to share what I have with those who were not so lucky as to be born here. A tankful of gas to me can make the difference between a family having electricity for months.
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a social worker helping people with mental illnesses, then I went to medical school and now I am in residency training to be a psychiatrist.

lender.name: Mongolia Car Rental
lender.loan_because: Small businesses need finance. Micro finance is essential because it fills a gap that commercial institutions cannot. The money earned from small business is well spent because it is hard earned. It feeds the family, puts children to school and builds the future. Life has been good to us, we want to give something back. Lending to micro finance is a way to say thank you to the generations before us that wanted the generation ahead to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: We are a socially responsible rental car company in Mongolia. If you want to see a vast and wild country with a lot of history maybe Mongolia is a place for you to visit.

lender.name: Samuel
lender.occupational_info: I am a full time student. I work part time as a dishwasher to earn the money I give to Kiva

lender.name: Rupert
lender.loan_because: Lending directly to small entrepreneurs is by far the best way of helping people develop. It is way more efficient than going through international NGOs, or government departments, both of which need fortunes to maintain their costly bureacracies.
lender.occupational_info: I advise small businesses and public institutions how to communicate with the public; sounds easy but the real challenge is breaking down internal barriers to communication.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to work for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I give anesthesia to patients having surgery in the operating room at Kaiser Permanente in Santa Rosa, California.

lender.name: Michelle & Josh
lender.occupational_info: I help people improve their health and well-being through nutrition.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I should
lender.occupational_info: average income office worker struggling to make ends meet, so know what it's like to scratch for cash, especially in my younger years

lender.name: Rudy
lender.loan_because: I think this is a teriffic way of helping people get access to funds to establish or grow their own business.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Credit Union managing the finances by raising funds to lend to others.

lender.name: Our Family
lender.loan_because: if everyone who can lend $25 does it, together we can change the world!

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: Lending honors the dignity that inheres in every human being. I lend to certain kinds of enterprises because of my affinity for farming and the need in this world for people to be connected to the earth and its plants and animals.

lender.name: spuknicpan
lender.loan_because: if my money can change thier life better i think its very interesting to give this loan.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: This way allows me to see the people who will benefit.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the pharmaceutical industry to try to develop new medicines.

lender.name: Megumi
lender.loan_because: I want my money to be somehow useful for others. Even if I'm spending a depressing office days here in Tokyo, it can give me a meaning.
lender.occupational_info: sales representative of advertizement of house renovation magazine...can you imagine?

lender.name: RonM
lender.loan_because: We are all living on the same planet and I want to be a good neighbor
lender.occupational_info: Retired business person now an environmental organizer

lender.name: Mary Kivafriends.org
lender.loan_because: there are so many people who just need a little help to achieve their goals. This is a great way of helping them out!

lender.name: Steffi
lender.loan_because: it's such an opportunity to do good with my money over and over again!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that produces and sells vaccinations to prevent people from diseases such as measles, rabies, hepatitis, diphtheria and influenza.

lender.name: Patrizia
lender.loan_because: I think it most urgent to heal the world to help the poorest so they can truly add to a better world. To do it via internet is the most effective and easiest way.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to be happier and more relaxed. I help them to take more care of themselves so they can start to care about others.

lender.name: Danna
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference in someone's life

lender.name: Ilse
lender.loan_because: "Be the change you want to see in the world..."

lender.name: El Maje
lender.loan_because: I was moved by the work that the Kiva organization is doing by helping others around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Artist, musician, volunteer and dreamer.

lender.name: Nola
lender.loan_because: My daughter, son-in-law, and 2 grandchildren got me started with a birthday gift and I think it's a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I own and manage a company that files the necessary paperwork to get insurance companies to pay healthcare companies for the services the healthcare companies provide to people.

lender.name: Joke
lender.loan_because: I think people all over the world should help each other to get a better life.

lender.name: Melinda
lender.loan_because: I live in the best country in the world & in my life I have been so blessed. I want to give back to others.
lender.occupational_info: I run our family home of three boys and work with my husband in real estate investment.

lender.name: Inge
lender.loan_because: I am a single mom with 3 kids and we eat every day. I want to help and make a differens.
lender.occupational_info: I work with disabled people.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I cannot be there personally to help, and Kiva provides an excellent tool for connecting people.
lender.occupational_info: My partner and I create e-commerce websites, so that people can do business transactions on the internet.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: It takes a village...
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to be a lawyer

lender.name: Bob Allard
lender.loan_because: I am convinced that entrepreneurs are the lifeblood of our global economy and the only hope for developing countries to develop faster!
lender.occupational_info: My company creates teams that build long term software engineering solutions for companies that integrate mobile, web and database into powerful platforms for productivity.

lender.name: Seamus
lender.loan_because: I like people.
lender.occupational_info: I provide food and well being to those living in my area.

lender.name: Gisela
lender.loan_because: there is nothing more satisfying than helping someone else make their dream come true :-)

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I do mission work in Haiti, and I see the great need for assitance to help folks help themselves. KIVA fills a great need.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: We are So Blessed......

lender.name: Ian Z
lender.loan_because: It helps grow the 3rd World Economy. When the economy grows, less people have to deal with adversities. More happiness means more peace. More peace means less wars. Less wars means less death. Less death is good.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: To help others that can't access money from other souces.

lender.name: LISA & EMILY
lender.loan_because: We are very fortunate and thankful for all we have.

lender.name: kristen
lender.loan_because: We all have an obligation to assist each other to improve the human condition and offer opportunity equally.
lender.occupational_info: I am a social worker specializing in mental health services for children.

lender.name: Alejandro
lender.loan_because: a little dignity goes a long way

lender.name: Eddie
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I believe we can change the world, one small act at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children in an elementary school.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: this seems a good way to help
lender.occupational_info: I am the pastor of a church in Northern Ireland

lender.name: Lilian
lender.loan_because: my son introduced me to this idea and I think it's a good way to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am the wife of a church pastor

lender.name: Gerard
lender.loan_because: In a way, it's quite unfair that a relatively small part of the world's inhabitants owns an enormous percentage of all the world's resources. I feel very privilaged to have all I need for a decent living. In fact... it's embarrassing to have much more than I need. It's not a quality that I grew up in a country where I can afford me all the things I need... I feel obligated to share my wealth.

lender.name: Günter
lender.loan_because: I spent much time in Asia and Africa. I want to show my sympathy to People who have less than I have and help them for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I travel Internationally so sell products for the construction Industry

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: We need to spread the wealth.

lender.name: Brian and Erin
lender.loan_because: we believe in the power of individuals to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: Erin is a Water Engineer - she builds wells, tanks, pumps, pipes and treatment systems to bring water to people in several cities. Brian is a Computer Engineer - he works for a company which allows you to buy and sell items using the internet

lender.name: Grace
lender.loan_because: I feel this will help people gain economic independence and education, and help change living conditions around the world. It feels amazing to help someone who is a total stranger.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to become healthier AND happier through exercise and eating balanced, nutritious meals.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage and empower women across the globe to be self sufficient and to take charge of their economic well being.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a New York State agency as a Health Information Manager, maintaining health records and computer information related to prison health care.

lender.name: Berkant
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who are trying to do good.
lender.occupational_info: IT consultant in the financial industry.

lender.name: Susann
lender.loan_because: My MBA group chose Kiva to study as a social/organizational network. All of us in the group also wanted to help a business.

lender.name: Chapel Hills Youth Group
lender.loan_because: We like to help people
lender.occupational_info: We are a teenage church group

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: I think that the loans are a great gift. Receiving the loans and then repaying them allows the receiver to have more respect for himself.

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: I believe in sharing.
lender.occupational_info: I help school children complete their homework.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: I image a world without poverty
lender.occupational_info: I analyze blood samples from cancer patients and bone marrow donors.

lender.name: Geoff & Regan
lender.loan_because: We have always felt a need to give back to people without. We hope that lending money through Kiva, we can make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: We are both Realtors, and have been helping people buy and sell homes for over 20 years.

lender.name: Kristine
lender.occupation: Teacher of the Blind & Visually Impaired

lender.name: Kathleen
lender.loan_because: So, that in some small way, I can improve the living situation of a family and encourage self sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired now but am involved in a lot of volunteer work.

lender.name: Jake
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: निर्वाण Nirvana

lender.name: Tracy & Josh
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with a supportive and loving family. I want to pass along some of the help that I have received over the years.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a busy suburban library and get a kick out of helping people locate the resources they need.

lender.name: Alejandro
lender.occupational_info: I am a doctor for children.

lender.name: Ed and Sandy
lender.loan_because: We are blessed with abundance and want to share that with others, especially women who just need a chance to lead more independent lives and better care for their families. Everyone benefits from these loans!
lender.occupational_info: Ed helps aerospace organizations and their leaders plan and implement successful business strategies.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: helping others satisfies me. Having toured through several developing countries, I appreciate the positivity I see in people, in spite of the fact they live in challenging conditions. Being the agent of positive change to others is wonderful.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I feel blessed to have what I do and there's nothing like the joy that comes from knowing you are helping someone live a better life.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel connected to the rest of the world; I like the concept of the world-all the lenders-pooling small loans to make big differences in peoples' lives; my teen sons feel great that they can help someone even if the don't have lots of money.

lender.name: Josh
lender.loan_because: it changes peoples lives

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: We are all one big family

lender.name: Brooks
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves to be a part of the economy.
lender.occupational_info: Mostly I help clean the water and soil of toxic chemicals and keep workers safe in their work with protective equipment.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I enjoy donating on KIVA. I like that I get to search for just the right cause and watch them achive their goal.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer at a therapeutic horseback riding facility, a horse refuge and a library.

lender.name: Pakpoom
lender.occupation: Stock Analyst, Real Estate Developer, Speaker...
lender.loan_because: To change the world, one entrepreneur at a time.

lender.name: Sherri
lender.loan_because: I can't give lots of money. But a little money here can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I help people (adults and children) with language and speech problem or feeding and swallowing problems.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: As a former small business owner I want to help women in developing countries be successful in their business so they can provide food, health care and education for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I help make laws and help people in our city.

lender.name: Alexander
lender.loan_because: Mommy and daddy want me to learn about other parts of the world and how important it is to be generous.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother, a partner, a volunteer and somebody who helps companies market their solutions to other companies.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: Because I think its a great idea to help someone be self sufficient.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Compliance Manager.

lender.name: Cathy
lender.loan_because: It gives me pleasure to share what I have worked so hard to gather.
lender.occupational_info: I teach health. My classes have 20 people in them and I help people to think of better ways to act so that they can be healthy.

lender.name: Christa-Lee
lender.loan_because: Because it is a way I can help people fulfill their dreams!
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a restaurant and liquor store.
